description:
I just love it when I get a hot blonde guy in the door!
Brennan is an athlete who excelled at the sports you would think his lean body would be good at- rugby, wrestling, and lacrosse.
His body is lean and mean, and I especially love the dusting of blonde hair all over his body. At last a completely natural guy!
Brennan is a bit shy, and was unsure he had what it would take do porn, but I think between his awesome back door and a nicely equipped front door he will do just fine. He truly fits the "guy next door" look. This is one of the solos where the guy just closes his eyes and gets lost in the moment.
He agreed after the shoot that he would let a guy suck him off, so I am gonna quickly make sure that happens!
Stay tuned!
title: Brennan - Solo
